forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with a wind-driven rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Gusty winds developing. Partly cloudy skies giving way to cloudy skies with periods of rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 54F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers late. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
